services_intro: All our services guarantee you solutions for all areas of e-commerce

storage_and_packaging.title: Storage and Packaging
storage_and_packaging.desc: We provide you with secure and equipped storage spaces to keep your products in perfect condition, with smart inventory management that ensures constant quantity updates. We also offer professional packaging services according to the highest standards, ensuring that orders reach your customers with high quality and a unique unboxing experience. Additionally, you can rely on our private warehouses available 24/7 to store and manage your products with ease and security.

customer_service.title: Customer Service
customer_service.desc: Customer support is a fundamental element in the success of any online store, so we provide you with a specialized team to respond to customer inquiries, handle their requests and issues quickly and professionally, helping you build a strong relationship with your customers and increase loyalty and repeat purchases.

fast_shipping.title: Fast Shipping and Delivery to Ensure a
fast_shipping.desc: We guarantee fast and reliable shipping services in collaboration with the best delivery companies, ensuring that orders reach your customers on time and in excellent condition, enhancing customer satisfaction and reducing return rates.

profit_collection.title: Profit Collection and Transfer Within
profit_collection.desc: No need to wait long to receive your profits! With Makhzoun, we guarantee the collection and transfer of your profits within 24 hours, giving you a fast cash flow to support your expansion and business growth without any delay. We provide more than 10 different payment methods, including bank transfers, e-wallets, and payment cards, giving you complete flexibility in receiving your profits in the way that suits you.

product_import_and_quality_check.title: Product Import and Quality Check with
product_import_and_quality_check.desc: We help you find trending products and import them at the best prices, with a thorough quality check before shipping them to your warehouses, ensuring that you offer reliable products that maintain your store's reputation and enhance customer trust.

additional_inventory_services.title: Additional Inventory Services
additional_inventory_services.desc: We provide additional services such as financing (Fund) that allows you to get products now and pay later after achieving sales, helping you grow your business without the need for a large initial investment. We also offer a Visa to facilitate online payments, enabling you to grow your e-commerce business without financial constraints.

detailed_reports.title: Detailed Reports to Track and Analyze
detailed_reports.desc: Through the dashboard, you can access accurate reports about your inventory, including sorting details and available quantities, as well as sales performance and return rates. This data helps you make smart decisions to improve your operations and boost your profits.

who_we_are: Who We Are and Why Choose Us
slogan: Makhzoun is Your Ideal Partner for Successful
about_makhzon: With Makhzoun, start your e-commerce business in the Arab region without the need for capital. We provide you with unique products at competitive prices, covering everything from shipping and storage to collection and returns. Our specialized team ensures the highest delivery rates and the lowest return rates, with high-quality products and diverse payment options to collect your profits quickly and easily.

faqs.question: Do I need capital to start my business?
faqs.answer: No, you can start without capital using the dropshipping model or M5zoonâs product financing services, helping you grow without a large initial investment.

faqs.question: How can I receive my profits with M5zoon?
faqs.answer: Your profits are easily transferred via your bank account or e-wallet. We also provide Cash on Delivery (COD) collection options for greater flexibility.

faqs.question: Can I sell products if I am outside the Gulf countries?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can sell products from anywhere in the world. M5zoon supports international shipping and distribution, making it easier to reach your target markets.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum withdrawal limit for profits?
faqs.answer: There is no strict minimum, but some conditions may depend on the transfer method, bank, or e-wallet used. For more details, you can contact support.

faqs.question: Which countries does M5zoon support?
faqs.answer: M5zoon supports most Gulf countries, including Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, and Oman, and we are expanding internationally to support new markets soon.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum withdrawal limit for profits?

about-us.title: Get to Know Us
about-us.success_message: Makhzon is your place to achieve success in
about-us.platform_description: A comprehensive e-commerce and dropshipping platform designed to provide innovative and easy solutions for shoppers and business owners in the Middle East. Makhzon was founded to simplify the process of selling products online by offering unique products, outstanding logistics services, and full support for entrepreneurs and online store owners.
about-us.technical_support_description: Innovative technical support, always by your side to ensure your business runs smoothly and efficiently. We turn every technical challenge into an opportunity for success.
about-us.financial_security_description: We offer you a secure financial experience, ensuring high-quality products and continuous account monitoring to maximize your profits.
about-us.comprehensive_services: We provide all services related to e-commerce, from product management to customer follow-up, ensuring your business success.
